name: Shin Megami Tensei: Liberation Dx2
storyline:
"Devil Downloaders. Also known as Dx2.

Those that wield the power to summon demons using a special smartphone app.

Led by a mysterious man, you gain this power yourself and become a member of the Liberators. Now, as part of this secret organization that fights to protect the world, you find yourself caught up in a battle between opposing factions of Dx2s.

The enemy is known only as the Acolytes. Behind the seemingly peaceful facade of our modern society, malicious intent lurks. To what depths will the Dx2s have to go as they continue to fight?"
summary:
A free-to-play mobile rpg developed by SEGA based on the Atlus series Shin Megami Tensei.

"Shin Megami Tensei: Liberation Dx2 is a turn-based role-playing game coming to Android and iOS mobile devices. Summon, fuse, and raise your own demons to fight by your side. The game will feature sweet AR functionalities and intense multiplayer feats!"
